description-about: Full-Stack Developer passionate about building modern, high-performance applications focused on delivering the best user experience. I have solid experience with technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Node.js. I'm always looking to learn something new and apply my knowledge to solve real-world problems with smart and scalable solutions.
